about_the_game:
The crystal of challenge and perseverance!

"Up & Over" offers a simple yet powerful experience. Players must reach the summit exploring the sky-high structures with only jumps and WASD manipulations. Players must master the environment and overcome mistakes through strategic decisions.

Key Features

  • Physical-based movement

    the movement of characters is based on realistic laws of physics, and every mistake can be fatal.

  • Limited checkpoint usage

    Each checkpoint can be used up to three times. Activating a new checkpoint initializes the number of previous checkpoints available. Strategic use is the key to success.

  • Vertical Exploration

    The game is played by climbing over a huge aerial island structure. Each level consists of a unique design and difficulty, and if you make a mistake, you may fall down and have to start all over again.

  • Choose Risk and Reward

    Once you have exhausted all your checkpoints, you must either go back or choose whether to proceed at risk.

  • Visual Attraction

    Beautiful and mysterious aerial islands set in the background, each level filled with the scenery and structures you want to explore.

Game Play Mechanism

  • Jump and WASD operation

Players move their characters with simple manipulations, and must overcome the slopes and obstacles of their environment. Proceed with pure control without parkour.

  • Checkpoint system

    • Each level has a number of checkpoints.

    • You can return to the checkpoint by pressing R, but there are three usage restrictions per checkpoint.

    • Activating a new checkpoint initializes the number of previous checkpoints available.

  • Risks and Rewards

Players can use checkpoints efficiently by reducing mistakes, or take on excessive challenges to pursue greater rewards.

  • Drop Penalty

If you miss a scaffold or make a mistake, you can fall under a structure. However, the opportunity to find a path again is always open.

name: Up & Over

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Up & Over is a physics-based 3D platform game that challenges you to the top with just pure technology and patience. Use checkpoints strategically and take risks or make smart choices along the way. Overcome your mistakes and feel a sense of accomplishment that pushes your limits!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Dutch, Russian, Vietnamese, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Korean, Hungarian
